scripts.build: npm run tsc && npm run build.native
scripts.postclone: npm i && node scripts/postclone.js && cd ../demo && npm i && npx rimraf -- package-lock.json && cd ../src
scripts.test.android: npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.demo.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run ios --syncAllFiles --emulator
scripts.demo.android: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run android --syncAllFiles --emulator
scripts.demo.reset: cd ../demo && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-custom-bottomsheet && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: npm run demo.reset && npx rimraf -- node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
scripts.nd.build.release: npm run nd.build.release.native.ios && npm run nd.build.release.native.android
scripts.nd.build.simulator: npm run nd.build.simulator.native.ios && npm run nd.build.native.android
scripts.nd.build.device: npm run nd.build.device.native.ios && npm run nd.build.native.android
scripts.nd.demo.android: npm run nd.open.android.studio && npm run nd.demo.tns.run.android
scripts.nd.demo.ios: npm run nd.open.xcode && npm run nd.demo.tns.run.ios
scripts.nd.demo.ios.device: npm run nd.open.xcode && npm run nd.demo.tns.run.ios
scripts.nd.demo.angular.android: npm run nd.open.android.studio && npm run nd.demo.angular.tns.run.android
scripts.nd.demo.angular.ios: npm run nd.open.xcode && npm run nd.demo.angular.tns.run.ios
scripts.nd.demo.angular.ios.device: npm run nd.open.xcode && npm run nd.demo.angular.tns.run.ios
scripts.nd.demo.vue.android: npm run nd.open.android.studio && npm run nd.demo.vue.tns.run.android
scripts.nd.demo.vue.ios: npm run nd.open.xcode && npm run nd.demo.vue.tns.run.ios
scripts.nd.demo.vue.ios.device: npm run nd.open.xcode && npm run nd.demo.vue.tns.run.ios
scripts.nd.native.debugger.android: npm run nd.build.native.android && npm run nd.open.android.studio
scripts.nd.native.debugger.ios: npm run nd.build.simulator.native.ios && npm run nd.open.xcode && cd /Users/costacaravotas/Projects/temp/nativescript-custom-bottomsheet/src
scripts.nd.native.debugger.ios.device: npm run nd.build.device.native.ios && npm run nd.open.xcode && cd /Users/costacaravotas/Projects/temp/nativescript-custom-bottomsheet/src
scripts.nd.demo.run.watch.android: npm run nd.open.android.studio && npm run nd.demo.tns.run.android
scripts.nd.demo.run.watch.ios: npm run nd.open.xcode && npm run nd.demo.tns.run.ios
scripts.nd.demo.run.watch.device.ios: npm run nd.open.xcode && npm run nd.demo.tns.run.ios
scripts.nd.demo.angular.run.watch.android: npm run nd.open.android.studio && npm run nd.demo.angular.tns.run.android
scripts.nd.demo.angular.run.watch.ios: npm run nd.open.xcode && npm run nd.demo.angular.tns.run.ios
scripts.nd.demo.angular.run.watch.device.ios: npm run nd.open.xcode && npm run nd.demo.angular.tns.run.ios
scripts.nd.demo.vue.run.watch.android: npm run nd.open.android.studio && npm run nd.demo.vue.tns.run.android
scripts.nd.demo.vue.run.watch.ios: npm run nd.open.xcode && npm run nd.demo.vue.tns.run.ios
scripts.nd.demo.vue.run.watch.device.ios: npm run nd.open.xcode && npm run nd.demo.vue.tns.run.ios
